title: Emoji cupcakes
ingredients: ['110g (4 oz) butter or margarine, at room temperature', '110g (4 oz) caster sugar', '2 eggs, lightly beaten', '1 teaspoon vanillia extract', '110g (4 oz) self-rasing flour', '2 tablespoons milk', 'rollable yellow icing', 'chocolate icing or black/brown decorative icing']
